H0.text: In Greek mythology, Amphitrite, queen of the sea, was the wife of which god. Poseidon

H1.text: In Greek mythology, Amphitrite, queen of the sea, was the wife of which god. Triton

H2.text: In Greek mythology, Amphitrite, queen of the sea, was the wife of which god. Oceanus

H3.text: In Greek mythology, Amphitrite, queen of the sea, was the wife of which god. Clieto

A4.text: His consort was Amphitrite, an ancient sea-goddess and nymph.

A5.text: Together they had a son named Triton, a merman.
